mapper.select: SELECT /* PanelCardInfoMapper.xml, getPanelList, SAC/정희원 , 2014-10-10 */ PANEL_ID, PANEL_DESC, PANEL_LEVEL, MAX_DP_CNT_CARD FROM TB_DP_PANEL WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PANEL_ID like #{panelId} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY PANEL_LEVEL, EXPO_ORD

SELECT /* PanelCardInfoMapper.xml, getPanelMappingList, SAC/정희원 , 2014-10-10 */ CARD_ID, EXPO_START_DT, EXPO_END_DT, DD_START_TM, DD_END_TM, EXPO_WKDY FROM TB_DP_PANEL_CARD_MAPG WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PANEL_ID = #{panelId} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' -- AND sysdate BETWEEN EXPO_START_DT AND EXPO_END_DT ORDER BY EXPO_ORD

SELECT /* PanelCardInfoMapper.xml, getCardSegment, SAC/정희원 , 2014-10-13 */ OUTSD_MBR_LEVEL_CD, INSD_MBR_LEVEL_CD, SEX, AGE_CLSF_CD, DEVICE_CHG_YN, NEW_ENTRY_YN, MNO_CD, CATEGORY_BEST FROM TB_DP_CARD_SEGM WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND CARD_ID = #{cardId}

SELECT /* PanelCardInfoMapper.xml, getIntegratedMenuList, SAC/정희원 , 2014-05-19 */ TENANT_ID, SYSTEM_ID, MENU_KEY, UP_MENU_KEY, EXPO_ORD, IMG_PATH, MENU_NM, INJT_VAR, KEY_TYPE FROM TB_DP_MENU_LIST_CATEGORY WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND UP_MENU_KEY = #{upMenuKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND KEY_TYPE IN ('DP01230001','DP01230002') ORDER BY KEY_TYPE, EXPO_ORD
